message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm happy to pay $90 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $110.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but I'm still not quite there yet.  $105 is the absolute most I can do. If we can't reach a deal at that price, I'll have to go with John's offer.
I understand you're getting close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering the product to you for $115.
